title: Growth of crowdfunding platforms worldwide 2008 to 2012
yAxis: Growth in the number of CFPs
summary: This statistic shows the worldwide Growth held by Growth as a percentage of crowdfunding platforms number from 2008 to 2012 .
Growth are forecast to account for 60 % of crowdfunding platforms PC number in 2012 , up from just 38 % in 2008 .
In 2009 , Apple 's MacBook Air number are expected to total 8.4 million devices .
